title: RosettaMempoolResponse
description: A MempoolResponse contains all transaction identifiers in the mempool for a particular network_identifier.

items.title: TransactionIdentifier
items.description: The transaction_identifier uniquely identifies a transaction in a particular network and block or in the mempool.

hash.description: Any transactions that are attributable only to a block (ex: a block event) should use the hash of the block as the identifier.
